TopicTitle: Probably the most lucky splash down

Articles.Content:
It was over. Bill was about dead. My ship was going at 14 m/s, and that's too strong for my ship. Should I revert mission? Nah, lets see what happens. Theres goes all that good science. There goes my hour of progress. Maybe I should give up.

Then suddenly, the Kraken came out of the darkness (yeah this part is made up) and used his magically magical magic and completely blew away the rest of my ship, and then causing what remained to bounce up, and then splash down at about 7 m/s. The parts of the ship that were left behind were the parachutes, the capsule, and my goo containers! The Kraken has saved poor Billy!

tl;dr: When my ship splashed down, it was completely blown way except for my science parts, the capsule, and the parachutes. Literally I lost all of my ship except the parts that I needed.
